title: Avocado and cucumber salad
ingredients: ['2 medium cucumbers, cubed', '2 avocados, cubed', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons finely chopped spring onions (optional)', '1/4 teaspoon salt', 'black pepper to taste', '1/4 large lemon', '1 lime']
